title: Sami, Joe and I
overview: Sami, Joe and Leyla are ready for a truly epic summer after finishing school and ready to get out and grab their slice of life. But what is to come is diametrically opposed to their expectations. Determined to stand up for themselves, the three friends find out how right Leylaâ€™s mom was when she told them: always keep more dreams in your soul than reality can destroy.
